Message.value: Invalid configuration detected. At least one drive must have non-zero value.

Message.description: Superlog error: Internal structures became corrupted
Window Title/Settings Page Title: Data Processing

Message.value: Select the location(s) the program will use to store the temporary monitored data. You can also specify the data storage policy on this page.

Message.description: Window Title: Low Disk Space Warning

Message.key: Do not display this warning anymore
Message.description: Checkbox: Do not display this warning anymore

Message.key: Device Monitoring Studio requires at least 512 MB of free disk space on one of the volumes for normal operation. If you cannot free the required space, you won't be able to monitor long session with large data transfers.
